suncertify.db.spec
Interface DataAccessObject<P,R>

Type Parameters:
P - Primary key type.
R - Record type.
All Known Implementing Classes:
URLyBirdFile_1_2_1
public interface DataAccessObject<P,R>

Provides a unified interface to a persistent mechanism, isolating the client from the storage nature.

Version:
1.0 27/09/2010
Author:
Ignacio del Valle Alles
See Also:
Wikipedia DAO article
